area_name: What's With all These Tiny Trees? (WWATTT)

content.description: Little Bits is a fun route on the right side of the boulder. Start with a sit start with your left hand on a good edge and your right hand in a jam. Move straight up with lots of great feet and unique hand holds. Your goal is a V cutout in the rock, from there you can you can roll over the side and top out. Once on top, walk off the back side of the boulder and back downhill to the start. Look out for cacti and slippery grass on your way back down.
content.protection: One to two pads and a spotter.
content.location: It is on the right side of the boulder.

climbs.name: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle

content.description: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle is an awesome route that starts out easy but gets harder the further you go. Start with a bomber undercling, and work your way up the route. Find the hidden crimps near the top for a spicy topout. The walkoff for this route is on the left hand side near the back of the boulder.
content.protection: One to two pads and a spotter.
content.location: It is located on the left side of the boulder.

content.description: This is a really fun traverse across the entire face of WWATTT. Start as far over as possible, and work your way across.
content.location: It is on the front face of the boulder.

pathTokens: What's With all These Tiny Trees? (WWATTT)
